metadata.description: The next generation of Un-Men has arrived! The unnatural, monstrous creations of Anton Arcane are back and their reemergence begins with one unlucky soul named Damien Kane. The spawn of two of Arcane's abominations, 23 year-old Damien's de-evolution has begun and now he must look to the past to ensure his future and the future of...the Un-Men!
metadata.name: American Freak: A Tale of the Un-Men
